title: Marriage Equality
body: Hello I'd like to marry my GOLDFISH, I LOVE my GOLDFISH the fact i can't marry the GOLDFISH i LOVE spits in the face of marriage equality, rito give me justice and allow me to marry GOLDFISH!

replies.body:
The goldfish has to state his intention to marry, and must be free to do so of his own free will without impedements or coercion.
Unless the goldfish agrees, i'm sorry, but you won't be able to marry him.

Same principle applies to Jessica Alba, as i found out.
are you elmo? I heard you love your goldfish
